predicate.note: Frames file for 'found' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry. Comparison with institute and set.

example.name: transitive
example.text: Mr. Mingo was chief executive officer of the Mingo Group, which he founded *trace* in 1977 and which created ads for the black market.

example.name: with attribute
example.text: John founded the city of Atlantis as a stronghold in times of trouble.
example.arg: a stronghold in times of trouble
